p: Rhabdomyosarcoma (RD) cells were grown in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM; Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA), 10% fetal calf serum (HyClone, Logan, UT), and 1% penicillin-streptomycin (Invitrogen). Human induced cortical neurons and astrocytes were purchased from Cellular Dynamics, Fujifilm, and grown according to the manufacturer’s specifications (Cellular Dynamics, Madison, WI).
